issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] ParquetExec reports incorrect statistics
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11014](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11014). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ParquetExec represents one or more Parquet files and currently only returns statistics based on the first file.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11014?focusedCommentId=17254317) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8992
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8992>
